description: Support for environment modules (Lmod, Environment Modules) in Positron
configuration.title: Environment Modules
configuration.enabled.description: Enable environment modules support for runtime discovery
configuration.moduleCommand.description: The command used to interact with the module system (default: 'module')

configuration.environments.description: Named environment configurations. Each key is an environment name, and the value specifies target languages and modules to load.
command.refreshEnvironments.title: Refresh Module Environments
